subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
Families and Family Life
lead_paragraph: Marc Turnesa, a grandson of one of seven golfing brothers from Westchester County, will play in the United States Open, the 46th time a Turnesa has played the event.
snippet: Marc Turnesa, a grandson of one of seven golfing brothers from Westchester County, will play in the United States Open, the 46th time a Turnesa has played the event.
